attributes.action: put into law sentences for death threats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would parliament to put into law a legal penalty for making death threats or killing threats to individuals of upto 10 years in jail. 

This protect the public from people who are clearly stupid or deliberately menacing people.

This will stop hostage/death threats ie kilburn from occuring and make people who should know not to make death threats save their own future from jail sentences.
